statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interaction_history;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interaction_history;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_details FROM customer_interaction_history;
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction_history WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interaction_history WHERE interaction_type = 'complaint';
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction_history WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interaction_history WHERE interaction_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_interaction_history WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%feedback%';
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction_history WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(interaction_date) AS last_interaction_date FROM customer_interaction_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'email';
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_content FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 2 AND interaction_type = 'call';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM CustomerInteractions;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 12345 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'email' AND interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'call' AND interaction_content LIKE '%complaint%' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'sms' GROUP BY interaction_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT CI.interaction_id, LP.program_name FROM CustomerInteractions CI JOIN LoyaltyPrograms LP ON CI.customer_id = LP.program_id WHERE LP.program_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, preferred_language FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY preferred_language DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT ci.customer_id, cp.preferred_communication_method, lp.membership_level FROM customer_interactions ci LEFT JOIN customer_preferences cp ON ci.customer_id = cp.customer_id LEFT JOIN loyalty_program lp ON ci.customer_id = lp.customer_id WHERE lp.membership_level = 'Gold';
SELECT ci.customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interactions ci GROUP BY ci.customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;

SELECT ci.customer_id, SUM(lp.total_points) AS total_points FROM customer_interactions ci LEFT JOIN loyalty_program lp ON ci.customer_id = lp.customer_id WHERE ci.interaction_type = 'Redeem' GROUP BY ci.customer_id HAVING total_points > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction_history;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_interaction_history ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM loyalty_program WHERE program_id > 1;
SELECT customer_id, preferred_language FROM customer_preferences WHERE preferred_communication_method = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction_history ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM customer_interaction_history WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM communication_history WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY communication_date LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, preferred_language, preferred_communication_method FROM customer_preferences WHERE loyalty_program_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE program_name LIKE '%Gold%' ORDER BY program_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM loyalty_program WHERE program_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interaction ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'meeting';
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_id ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT customer.first_name, customer.last_name, loyalty_program.program_name FROM customer JOIN program_participation ON customer.customer_id = program_participation.customer_id JOIN loyalty_program ON program_participation.program_id = loyalty_program.program_id WHERE customer.customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM customer_interaction GROUP BY interaction_type;

SELECT customer.first_name, customer.last_name, communication_history.communication_type, communication_history.communication_date FROM customer LEFT JOIN communication_history ON customer.customer_id = communication_history.customer_id ORDER BY customer.last_name, communication_history.communication_date DESC;

SELECT customer.customer_id, customer.first_name, customer_interaction.interaction_type, communication_history.communication_type FROM customer LEFT JOIN customer_interaction ON customer.customer_id = customer_interaction.customer_id LEFT JOIN communication_history ON customer.customer_id = communication_history.customer_id WHERE customer.customer_id = 3 ORDER BY communication_history.communication_date DESC;
